directions: Whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until combined well, then toss with cabbage and carrots. Let stand, uncovered, at room temperature, tossing occasionally, until wilted, about 30 minutes. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
ingredients: 2 lb green cabbage, quartered, cored, and thinly sliced (8 cups)
title: Creamy Coleslaw
